adHeader: Special price $100 for Photofacial and Facial for Women and Men.
adDetails: Beyond the stressful moments of our lives is the special attention and pampering you receive at Anna Beauty Care I believe that skin care should be part of every person's health and beauty regimen. I would like to take this opportunity to invite you to sample a fine selection of my services. Utilizing natural products and specially developed skin care programs I promote a healthier, more attractive skin in the style of the Best European Spas. Through a wide range treatments I will develop a program to suit your specific needs. I look forward seeing You soon. European Facial - 60 Minutes $ 30 Acne Treatment - 75 Minutes $ 40 Microdermabrasion - 45 Minutes $ 30 Photo Facial - 60 Minutes $ 100 Prepay any 6 of the same treatments and get 1 additional treatment Free. Please call Anna for an Appointment at: show contact info Open 7 days a week from 9 am to 9 pm Can visit my website : www.annabeautycare.com Anna's Beauty Care is located in South San Jose, close to Chynoweth Avenue on Derek Drive. Anna only answers calls from a valid phone number and does not accept calls from "blocked" numbers. Please remember to "unblock" your number when you call. Thank You.
